method.name: get_animation
method.description: Return the name of the current animation set to the node.

method.name: get_sprite_frames
method.description: Get the [SpriteFrames] resource, which contains all frames.

method.name: is_playing
method.description: Return true if an animation if currently being played.

method.name: play
method.description: Play the animation set in parameter. If no parameter is provided, the current animation is played.

method.name: set_animation
method.description: Set the current animation of the node and reinits the frame counter of the animation.

method.name: set_frame
method.description: Set the visible sprite frame index (from the list of frames inside the [SpriteFrames] resource).

method.name: set_sprite_frames
method.description: Set the [SpriteFrames] resource, which contains all frames.

method.name: stop
method.description: Stop the current animation (does not reset the frame counter).
